title: Bloomberg Markets: Advisory Board Sells for $2.58 Billion
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Advisory Board Sells for $2.58 Billion
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Zachary Tracer Health Care Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Advisory Board Co., the hospital and education consulting company, will sell itself for $2.58 billion after billionaire activist investor Paul Singer’s Elliott Management Corp. took a stake in the business earlier this year.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
